post.body: Good Vibes, Good Vibes
Bento sounds cool. Let me know what you think about it!
Hey Babe. Miss you. Sorry couldn't call today. DH working. Birthday party tomorrow for Nate. Yikes!
@bmaso ROTFLMAO about the tweeting the world your fantasy with your wife! It gives new meaning to the public sex fantasy!
I voted on your poll. Not enough fruits or veggies all the way!
@nyc_mom - what is bento? Is it a database program. Just got a mac. Fascinated by all mac things
- Visited your blog. Definitely will try to win the wii fit! Iloved your site too. Such cute fashions
- No way! The glass of wine helps you practice balance and posture while working out ;-)
what is magpie tweets?
Definitely keep me updated! Curious if you think it helps you lose weight or just tone up! I've been dreaming of one here ...
Do you like the wii Fit? I am so jealous I desperately want one!
can't wait to see the newest recording. Still so many questions :-)
Here is your @reply. I did you #COIT course!
What book did you buy three times? It must have looked really good!
Just finished a double 4 year old birthday party for 40 + (kids & adults) Too busy 2day 2 tweet. Exhausted. Glad birthdays are only 1/yr
Off to go to bed and read Eclipse. Seriously no Twilight fans following me. Where are they all?
Just finished listening to VanishingActs by Jodi Picoult. Really good/interesting read. Not sure how I felt @ the ending. Overall 7.5 ish
re: my last tweet - Just got a mac after 11 years of PC use. What is your favorite Mac tip? Especially would love entourage tips
Back at work today trying to get organized. Still recovering from computer crash two weeks ago. I should not be so computer dependent!
Does anyone have a good website that lists all the twitter command shortcuts? I think rt is the only one I can remember! TIA from a newbie
